title: What Exactly Are the Dangers Posed by A.I.?
description: A recent letter calling for a moratorium on A.I development blends real threats with speculation. But concern is growing among experts.

title: ‘The Godfather of A.I.’ Quits Google and Warns of Danger Ahead
description: For half a century, Geoffrey Hinton nurtured the technology at the heart of chatbots like ChatGPT. Now he worries it will cause serious harm.
